subject: Soccer
Football Association Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Chelsea sealed a meeting with Liverpool in the F.A. Cup final on May 5 after thrashing its London rival Tottenham, 5-1, on Sunday at Wembley Stadium, aided by a controversial goal.
snippet: Chelsea sealed a meeting with Liverpool in the F.A. Cup final on May 5 after thrashing its London rival Tottenham, 5-1, on Sunday at Wembley Stadium, aided by a controversial goal.
